about_the_game:
Contains all of the musical tracks included in the base game.

1) New Dawn (Theme)
2) Roman Stuff
3) Promises and Ends
4) Word Battle
5) Pipe Dream
6) Burnam Wood

To install:

- Download the DLC.
- The music folder will be located in the game folder where your Steam game folders are located (steamapps/common/PS_STICK_RPG/)
detailed_description:
